trans-unit.source: Defines constants that specify whether cells, rows, or both, are used for selection in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义指定是否单元格、 行或两者，用于所选内容中的常量<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> properties together determine how users can select items in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>属性共同决定用户如何可以选择一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>中的项</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A> is Cell, the user can select only one cell at a time in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A>是单元格，用户可以在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>中一次选择一个单元格</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionUnit%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridSelectionMode></xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking a cell selects the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格选定的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a row or column header does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 单击行或列标题没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a cell selects only the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格选择仅的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a row header selects the full row.
Clicking a cell or a row header selects the full row.
trans-unit.target: 单击单元格或行标题可以选择整行。
